description:
The interview was recorded on ٍSeptember 22, 1997 with Muḥammad Ḥasan al-Aswad, male, born in 1920 in al-Karmil, Palestine and resides in al-Rashīdīyah Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon. He was Quarrier.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع محمد حسن الأسود في 22 أيلول سبتمبر عام 1997، ذكر، ولد عام 1920 في الكرمل، فلسطين ويقيم في مخيم الرشيدية للاجئين الفلسطينيين، لبنان. كان حجاراً.
contents: Zionist infiltration and political turmoil during the British Mandate. (@ 0:00)||Britain and Germany in the second world war . (@ 11:27)||Palestine from Ottoman to British rule. (@ 31:43)||Jews, Palestinians and one Palestine during the British Mandate. (@ 42:33)||Social life in Palestine before Nakba. (@ 58:58)||Community traditions and customs in Palestine during the British rule. (@ 68:46)
